text:
aqgniH paqSurA#sIqt tEnA#yajantaq sa EqtaM ~MlOqkama#jayaqd-yasmi#nnaqgniH sa tE# lOqkastaM jE$ShyaqsyathAva# jiGra vAqyuH paqSurA#sIqt tEnA#yajantaq sa EqtaM ~MlOqkama#jayaqd-yasmi#n vAqyuH sa tE# lOqkastasmA$t tvAq&ntarE$ShyAmiq yadiq nAvaqjiGra#syAdiqtyaH paqSurA#sIqt tEnA#yajantaq sa EqtaM ~MlOqkama#jayaqd yasmi# -( )-nnAdiqtyaH sa tE# lOqkastaM jE$Shyasiq 
yadya#vaqjiGra#si || 58 
(yasmi# - nnaqShTau ca#) (A26)

Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 26 Anuvaakams :- 
(yO vA aya#thAdEvataq - ntvAma#gnaq - indra#syaq - cittiqM - ~MyathAq vai - vayOq vai - yadAkU#tAqd - yAstE# agnEq - mayi# gRuhNAmi - praqjApa#tiqH sO$&smAth - stEqgAn - vAja#M - kUqrmAn - yOktra#M - miqtrAvaru#NAq - vindra#sya - pUqShNa - Oja# - Anaqnda - maha# - raqgnE - rvAqyOH - panthAqM - kramaiq - rdyaustEq - &gniH paqSurA#sIqth - ShaDvi(gm)#SatiH)


Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 Series of Panchaatis :-
(yO vA - EqvA&&hu#ti - maBavan - paqthiBi# - ravaqrudhyA# - &&naqnda - maqShTau pa#~jcaqSat )


First and Last Padam of Seventh Prasnam of 5th Kandam :-
(yO vA aya#thAdEvataqM - ~Myadya#vaqjiGra#si )

Kaanda Korvai with starting Padams of 7 Prasanams of Kandam 5:-
( sAqviqtrANiq - viShNu#muKA - uthsannayaqj~jO - dE#vAsuqrA - yadEkE#naq - hira#NyavarNAq - yO vA#- saqpta )
|| hari#H OM ||

|| kRuShNa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pa~jcamakANDE saptamaH praSnaH samAptaH ||

|| iti pa~jcamaM kANDaM ||
===========================
